DOC.brief_summary: Canavan disease is caused by Aspartoacylase deficiency. There is no treatment for the disease, but there is a food additive that includes acetate . We suggest an early treatment with acetate and a neurologic evaluation, including MRI, after 4 months of treatment. In any case the treatment will be stopped at the age of 22 months, when myelinization is ended.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Glyceryl Triacetate (GTA) in Newborns With Canavan
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of Canavan disease Age above 18 months
